objective: Inline proof badge with modal deep-link and lineage visualization

inline_badge.description: Clickable proof badge with ref name and status indicator
inline_badge.acceptance: Badge renders with correct color coding (emerald/amber/rose)

modal_deep_link.description: Opens modal with proof details and copyable deep link
modal_deep_link.acceptance: Modal opens on click, deep link format: #proof:{refName}

lineage_tab.description: Modal tab system with Details and Lineage Timeline

telemetry_emission.description: Emits ui.proof_chip.open event on modal open
telemetry_emission.acceptance: Telemetry POST to /api/mcp/telemetry on chip click

accessibility.description: ARIA labels, keyboard navigation, focus management
accessibility.acceptance: tabIndex=0, aria-label, focus ring on focus

governance.criterion: Lineage Integrity - ProofChip v2 + HMAC check
